ModMetaData.name: ExtremeTemperature Personal Shields-Enhanced!
ModMetaData.author: BangUDie (and lots of help from Skullywag)
ModMetaData.description:
Adds 2 base shields for keeping warm or keeping cool. n

Now with the ability to fire out.

 

 Special thanks to Skullywag for his PersonalShieldMK2 coding from which this is derived from https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=14135.0
